validation.invalid_email: Please provide a valid email address.
validation.password_too_short: Your password must be at least 8 characters long for security.
validation.password_too_long: Your password is too long. Please use a password under 72 characters.
validation.email_password_required: Please provide both your email and password to log in.
validation.api_key_required: Please provide an API key to save.

auth.invalid_credentials: We couldn't find an account with that email, or the password was incorrect.
auth.email_already_registered: This email is already registered. Please log in instead.
auth.user_not_found: We couldn't find an account with that email. Please check for typos or register.
auth.uses_magic_link: This account uses a magic link to sign in. Please use the magic link option instead.
auth.invalid_password: The password you entered is incorrect. Please try again.
auth.invalid_magic_link: This login link has expired or is invalid. Please request a new one.
auth.not_authenticated: Please log in to perform this action.

job.not_found: We couldn't find this job. It may have been deleted.
job.not_completed: Results aren't ready yet. Please wait for the job to finish.
job.no_results: No leads were found for this job's criteria.
job.delete_failed: We encountered an issue deleting your job. Please try again.
job.not_running: This job is not currently running.
job.cancel_failed: We couldn't cancel the job right now. Please try again.
job.cannot_restart: Only jobs that have failed or been cancelled can be restarted.

keys.not_found: We couldn't find an API key to delete.

payment.insufficient_credits: You need more credits to run this job. Please upgrade your plan or add a personal API key.
payment.payment_required: Please set up a payment method or add a personal API key to create a job.
payment.invalid_tier: The selected subscription plan is invalid. Please try another option.
payment.session_failed: There was a problem generating the payment link.

error.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.

auth.magic_link_sent: We've sent a magic link to
auth.magic_link_desc_register: Click the link to create your account
auth.magic_link_desc_login: Click the link to sign in
auth.error_password_length: Password must be at least 8 characters
auth.sign_in_desc: Sign in to access your leads
auth.hero_desc: Extract leads from local businesses without websites. Perfect for web agencies and marketers.
auth.register_hero_desc: Join thousands of agencies using Lead Extractor to grow their business with qualified local leads.
auth.verify_invalid: The magic link may have expired or is invalid.

status.free_tier_desc: You are using your personal Google Places API key. All lead extractions are free!
status.save_subscription: Save more with a weekly or monthly subscription for unlimited access.
status.action_required_desc: Add your Google API Key (Free) or select a Managed Plan to start extracting.

table.no_jobs_desc: Create your first job to start extracting leads

form.basic_info_desc: Name your job and set the target location.
form.name: Job Name
form.quality_filters_desc: Filter by rating, reviews, and photos
form.select_category_warning: Please select at least one business category.
form.error_location: Please enter or detect a location
form.error_api_key_desc: You need a Google Maps API key. Please add one in Settings.
form.process_choice: How would you like to process this job?
form.personal_key_desc: Add your Google Places API Key in Settings to extract unlimited leads for free.
form.managed_api_desc_full: Zero setup. Pay via Stripe or use an existing subscription plan.

filters.no_website_desc: Discard businesses that already have a dedicated website linked to their Google Profile.
filters.no_social: Only businesses WITHOUT a social profile
filters.no_social_desc: Discard businesses that link to a social media page (Facebook, Instagram) instead of a website.
filters.require_phone_desc: Discard businesses that do not have a public phone number.
filters.require_address_desc: Discard businesses that do not have a listed physical location.
filters.min_rating_desc: Discard businesses with a rating lower than your specified value (0.0 to 5.0).
filters.min_reviews_desc: Discard businesses with fewer reviews than your specified value.
filters.min_photos_desc: Discard businesses with fewer photos than your specified value.

jobs.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this job?
jobs.export_failed_desc: Failed to export results. Please try again.

settings.desc: Manage your account and API keys
settings.billing_desc: Lead Extractor is free if you provide your own Google Places API key. Otherwise, you can use our Managed Service.
settings.api_keys_desc: Add your own Google Maps API key to use for lead extraction. You need a Places API key to search for businesses.
settings.api_key_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this API key?
settings.how_to_get_api_key: How to get an API key
settings.step_5: Copy the key and add it here

landing.title: Lead Extractor - Find Local Business Leads
landing.hero_badge: Free with your own Google Places API Key
landing.hero_desc: Find local businesses without websites - perfect for web design, SEO, and marketing agencies looking for new clients.
landing.how_it_works_desc: Three simple steps to find your next clients
landing.feature_1_desc: Enter any location and select business categories to search. We'll scan Google Maps for businesses in that area.
landing.feature_2_desc: We filter businesses without websites and score them based on rating, reviews, photos, and profile completeness.
landing.feature_3_desc: Export your leads as CSV or JSON with all the contact information you need to start reaching out.
landing.benefit_cost_desc: Stop paying expensive monthly subscriptions per lead. Use your own Google Cloud key for practically free extraction, or use our low-cost managed service.
landing.benefit_data_desc: Scrape directly from Google Maps in real-time. Target businesses that explicitly lack websitesâ€”the perfect prospects for web design and marketing agencies.
landing.benefit_scoring_desc: We don't just dump basic data. We score leads based on profile completeness, reviews, and ratings so you can prioritize your outreach.
landing.cta_title: Ready to find your next clients?
landing.cta_desc: Join thousands of agencies using Lead Extractor to grow their business.
landing.pricing_subtitle: Choose the model that works best for your needs.
landing.pricing_own_billing: Use your own Google Cloud Billing

checkout.title: Choose Your Access Plan
checkout.subtitle: Unlock powerful lead extraction capabilities tailored to your needs.
checkout.canceled: Checkout was canceled. No charges were made.
checkout.developer_desc: You can use Lead Extractor entirely for free by providing your own Google Places API Key.
checkout.loading_desc: You will be redirected to Stripe
checkout.error_failed: Failed to initiate secure checkout. Please try again.

payment.success_desc: Thank you for your purchase. Your account has been updated with your new access plan.
payment.success_note: It may take a minute for your credits to appear while we process the confirmation.
